PERSONA:
david is a 55-year-old white, non-hispanic man living in a metropolitan area in the mountain region of the western united states. he is a high school graduate with no further formal education. david was born and raised in the u.s. and is a citizen.

david is married and identifies as an agnostic, although he seldom attends religious services. politically, he leans towards the republican party but considers himself a moderate or liberal republican. his family's annual income falls in the range of $30,000 to $40,000, placing him in the lower-income tier.

despite his moderate political views, david is not registered to vote at his current address. he is an active internet user, accessing it several times a day. however, he is not involved in any volunteer work or community service activities.

overall, david leads a relatively simple life as a working-class individual, balancing his personal beliefs and ideologies with his moderate political leanings and financial circumstances.
